entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:42 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 1:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
